welcome_message_body: "Welcome to O'Hara, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allegheny County Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Allegheny County Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Pittsburgh International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Pittsburgh International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Pittsburgh International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butler County - Kenny Scholter Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at County Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at County Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westmoreland County Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Westmoreland County Airport is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to handle all types of cargo, from small packages to large shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
